What is Audio Booster for Crunchyroll?
Audio Booster for Crunchyroll is an innovative extension for the Chrome browser ğŸŒ, allowing you to increase the maximum volume of audio played on Crunchyroll. Easily adjust the volume using a slider ğŸšï¸ or predefined buttons in the extension's pop-up menu to achieve the optimal sound level. ğŸ”Š

ğŸ”¹ Volume Increase: Set the volume according to your needs.
ğŸ”¹ Predefined levels: Choose from ready-made volume settings for quick adjustment.
ğŸ”¹ Compatibility: Designed specifically for use with Crunchyroll.

Use the slider or predefined buttons in the extension's pop-up menu to increase the volume. ğŸ§
